topics.body:
So Valve at GDC is scheduling a public conference this Tuesday.
!http://fc02.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2012/362/8/4/i_want_to_believe___half_life_3_by_gigahertzzz-d5pinxp.jpg!

But in all probability it's just going to be about SteamOS.  Don't get me wrong; I'm excited for SteamOS because then Microsoft will have serious competition in operating systems thus will force them to stop doing stupid crap, but I really hope HL3 comes out one day.  Then again launching HL3 on the same day as the official launch of SteamOS would be a good idea.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
